derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (originally US): from Dutch koolsla, from kool 'cabbage' + sla (see slaw)

entry.tran: 凉拌卷心菜丝；生菜色拉
entry.def: Coleslaw is a salad of chopped raw cabbage, carrots, onions, and sometimes other vegetables, usually with mayonnaise.
